<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204611</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">GNP simulation using foods in the Americas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">BSP Simulation mit Nahrungsmitteln im Amerika</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Simulation de PNB en utilisant des nourritures en 
Amériques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Simulação do GNP usando alimentos nos Americas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Simulazione di PNL usando gli alimenti nei 
Americas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσομοίωση του ΑΕΠ που χρησιμοποιεί τα τρόφιμα στην 
Αμερική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Simulación del PIB usando los alimentos en las 
Américas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students are treated to "lunch" based on food supply and GNP distribution in Latin America.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer werden behandelt "zu Mittag zu 
essen" gegründet auf Nahrungsmittelzubehör und BSP Verteilung in 
lateinischem Amerika.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des étudiants sont traités "pour déjeuner" 
basé sur des approvisionnements alimentaires et la distribution de 
PNB en Amérique latine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes são tratados "para lunch" baseado 
na fonte de alimento e na distribuição do GNP em América latin.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi sono curati "per pranzare" basato su 
approvvigionamento di generi alimentari e su distribuzione di PNL in 
america latina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θεραπεύονται "στο μεσημεριανό γεύμα" 
βασισμένο στον ανεφοδιασμό τροφίμων και τη διανομή του ΑΕΠ στη 
λατινική Αμερική.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tratan a los estudiantes "para almorzar" basado en
suministro de alimentos y la distribución del PIB en América latina.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

        </lifeCycle>

VERSION:3.0

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
